biocontainers.name: scanpy
biocontainers.summary: Single-Cell Analysis in Python. Scales to >1M cells.

biotools.summary: Scalable toolkit for analyzing single-cell gene expression data. It includes preprocessing, visualization, clustering, pseudotime and trajectory inference and differential expression testing. The Python-based implementation efficiently deals with datasets of more than one million cells.

bioschemas.name: SCANPY
